passives.effects: Instantly heal for 15% of all damage dealt, including physical damage, magic damage, and true damage. Area of effect and pet damage only heals 5% for every unit affected.

Stores 30% of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, which is successively taken as damage over time true damage instead, dealing one-third of the stored damage every second.The last tick of stored damage cannot deal lethal damage, leaving the champion with 1 health.
